screen_desc: The screenshot shows a shopping cart page on an e-commerce website, displaying two LG UltraGear monitors. The first monitor, priced at $299.99, is a 32-inch QHD gaming monitor, while the second, priced at $999.99, is a 38-inch WQHD IPS curved gaming monitor. Both monitors have options to adjust the quantity and are available for purchase with the "Add" button. There's also a filter for sorting items by delivery and showing out-of-stock items, and an option to get email offers.
action_think: The user wants to clear shopping cart on Costco and then add LG Ultragear to the cart on Costco. Currently, the shopping cart is displaying items. To clear the cart, I should remove each item one by one. After clearing the cart, I should search for the LG Ultragear, add the first one to the cart, then proceed to checkout.
action_plan: Remove each item from the cart
Search for LG Ultragear on Costco
Add the LG Ultragear to the cart
action_desc: Click on the remove button for each item in the cart
action_result: You have added the first LG Ultragear monitor to the cart. You can proceed to checkout now.
